title: Undead: Hunch Back
description: 54 animations for your hunched back undead character.
longDescription:
This pack of 55 animations depict an undead walker with a hunched over back. Unaware and aware locomotion sets are included with turns for each.


PREVIEW VIDEO LINK:


Animation List:

Locomotion:

The following animations are supplied in both root motion and In-Place.
